long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension is used on bestfightodds.com. Clicking on the extension icon displays the implied probabilities in percentages of the fight odds. This extension saves the time and effort needed to manually plug the betting odds into a calculator.

Usage:
1) Make sure the extension icon is displayed by pinning it to the browser bar. ( You can do this by clicking on the Extension icon on Google Chrome which opens an dialogue box. Then you can click on the pin button next to this Chrome Extension.)
2) Go to bestfightodds.com
3) Click on the extension icon to toggle between normal fight odds and implied probability odds.


I am not responsible for any potential financial damages that result from the use of this extension including any bugs or calculation errors.
